Class ReportSectionNode

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasConnectionState, IHasDescription, com.mobius.vdrapi.IHasInfoForCreatingPages, IHasSectionInfo, IListFactory, INode
public class ReportSectionNode
extends SectionNode
implements IHasDescription

A ReportSectionNode class represents a section of a report located on a document server, and is created by a ReportVersionNode object. A section node contains a list of pages and data describing the section.

getKeyValue

public Object getKeyValue()
Returns the key value for this node. The key value is the section name, and is used as a search argument.
